jignasa patel02 so maybe next time exclude the words with a negative connotation: “wasted my time” “totally disappointed” “too much talking” “just another warm up no cardio” practically the whole comment seems rude. And to add the cherry on top you include a rolling eye emoji. You might not have been talking about her but you were being rude in general. This is a workout that  she probably planned out the moves to and took time to try to help people for FREE. Just keep your comments to yourself to be honest, if you have nothing nice to say don’t say anything at all. I had to take this back to pre school because clearly you can’t understand how to be a civil human being and respect others. You could’ve stated your opinion without being rude, others have said the same thing but in a more respectful manner.
@Marnique Reddick I don’t hate her she is fabulous here am talking about the workouts and not people who are doing this workout 🙄

Good for you, move on stop complaining.  Just don’t do anymore of her workouts, simple as that. I hate people who are always hating on others. If you don’t like something you don’t need to go to the comments to complain. You are saying you wasted time on the workout just like you wasted your time writing this dumb comment. What if this was cardio for others. You don’t know other peoples level, so next time look for a harder workout instead of complaining.

I'm sorry but I could not keep watching after the first 10 minutes, that was just waaay too much talking and quite annoying. But I can understand if some people find that motivating. It was just way too "Whoo be positive! Yeah" much for me. I don't like to be told if I want to party or not :D Seems to be a matter of personal preference though.
Thank you for stating your opinion without putting down others. This comment was written in a respectful way unlike others who were trying to bash her.
